pages.title: Dimensional Travel
pages.text: If you are interested in dimensional travel, this is the right entry in this book to learn the basics./br2The first thing you should know is which dimensions this mod has to offer. In addition to the Overworld, Nether and End dimensions, this mod adds the $(l:e_dimension_insanity_dimension)Insanity/el and $(l:e_dimension_depth_dimension)Depth/el dimensions.

Travelling to the Nether and End dimensions is usually done with the help of portals. But if you decide to travel to one of the mods' dimensions, you need a $(l:e_item_teleportation_crystal)Teleportation Crystal/el. This crystal can teleport you between dimensions by consuming your $(l:e_mana_player_mana)Mana/el.
